tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A  very Experienced, committed, dedicated in his profession. Always truly recommended to friends and family.

I’m upset about the experience I had at this clinic. I had a root canal treatment there, ******* *** **** *** **** ***  *** *** ***** *** ********* *** ***** *** (4-5 visits regularly) . I went for 2 other opinions and came to know that the nerves are still there hence the pain could have never gone on it’s own. It got also punctured 5 times instead of 3. I went so many times for follow ups and got told to keep taking meds and painkillers, even though that root canal was not done proper at the first appointment so pain could have never gone on it’s own. My dentist was shocked about the treatment and asked me if a fresher has done this and now we had to call a specialist to save my tooth. The lady dentist was unable to answer to me and made me speak to the dentist Dr Thaker *** *** ***** *** ********* *** ********** **** ***** **** ******* ** *** *** ** *** **** ******* ******** *** ******* *** *********** Does this justify my extra expenses and pain now plus being scared the tooth could be lost? 
A patient is complaining about pain *** *** ***** ******** Coming so many times for follow ups but gets sent home every time instructed to just take pain meds? Should Dr Thaker personally see a patient if the pain continues and it seems to be an issue? He met me once during consultation and then pushed me off to another colleague. ** ** *** ************** ** ****** ****** ********* *** ** ****** *** *** ****** *** *** *** *** ****** *** *** ****** ****** * **** ****** I don’t suggest anyone going there for this treatment

Experience with Dr Chitrang Shah was good, but the root canal procedure conducted by another doctor was painful. Took 2 hours and pain, discomfort lasted almost a week. tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a very good experience , very nice and well equipped clinic,  no waiting time and doc was very good

I visited dentist Dr. Chitrang Thaker on 27/12/2021 with regards to a dental filling. I have a ceramic cap which came of hence I did show the cap to doctor to which he clearly said that the same cannot be recemented as the cap is of no use. Dr. Chitrang Thaker suggested I have to go for a new ceramic cap for which I have to pay 2000/- for cement filling and 6000/- for the cap. So then I got in touch with my dentist and I visited him on 28/12/2021 , ** ********** *** *** *** **** **** ** ***** *** * **** ** * ** ****** *** ***** *** ****** ** **** **** *** ******** ****** ** ********* ***** ***** *********** *********
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback...We hope the cap stays for much more than 3 years.
You seem to have made an opinion on success of mere single day of unethical treatment given to you
The treatment suggested was as per proper dental treatment which was refilliing the tooth and making a fresh cap and not refitiing a cap with a filling inside the cap and allowing chance of re infection on a root canal treated tooth.
The dr who has done this work please ask him how many dentist wil do what he did and how many wil do what we suggested.

review: Visited for my tooth extraction. Firstly, I was explained whole procedure in a very detailed manner by Dr Chitrang and then I decided to go for my tooth extraction. I was literally shivering before going inside the cabin, but Dr Kalsi and Dr Chitrang made me feel very comfortable and it just got done without any pain. Dr Kalsi was courteous and proficient at his work. He did whole procedure impassively. I just had to be a bit careful with all the precautions and medication and there is no pain as such. A big thanks to their staff as well, they literally called to check whether I'm having any pain or not once I reached home. So much gratitude. 🙏🏻
reply_text:
Thank you  so much for your kind words of appreciation and trust in us...it only encourages us to do better.
Regards,
Team
The Dental Studio

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My husband and father in law have known Dr. Chitrang for years now and have been very satisfied with the quality of aid, care, advice as well as with the staff which is very warm and cordial.
For past three years I have been additionally consulting Dr. Jyoti at Dr. Chitrang’s clinic who is a pedodentist and is an expert in her field. Best part has been the way she engages with little ones and gets them smoothly cooperate for the most painful/ complex tooth procedures. Kids look forward to come to the clinic. It has been a great relief knowing them and having this clinic close to home.
reply_text:
Thank you Prachi for your kind words....it's a pleasure knowing you n sachin over the years....
Do let us know of any suggestion to further better our setup.
Thank you

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The location is convenient to locate and reach. The clinic is just opposite Goluldham temple near Dindoshi in Goregaon East. The clinic was neat and clean. The doctor was professional and he could understand the problem. Instead of a relatively costly, time consuming and painful process of root canal surgery, he suggested after doing some tests that I could manage with a tooth filing even though the cavity was quite big. He was supportive during the painful process and kept encouraging me. Thankully and luckily for me the filing has been working and the pain has gone away. I would recommend the doctor.
reply_text:
Hi Karan,
Many thanks for your kind words of appreciation.
Wishing you happy n healthy smiles....

Regards,
Team 
The Dental Studio

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Visited around 6 times for my tooth ache, they had told to undergo a root canal, however even after completion of root canal process the pain that I endured is still the same as before the root canal. **** *** **** **** *** ** ********** **** ******** ********* *** ********* ******* I have serious doubts if at all my tooth required a root canal as the pain never ever reduced. 

Later I was told it is in your mind, and all after that I stopped visiting them as felt humiliated.

A True Life Saver for Implants 

Had to in emergency so implant and being unaware much about the implant , dr.Chitrang knew I had a phobia about dentists and dental treatment but here Dr and his team made me feel so relaxed and completed the Implant Surgery which was complicated due to gum infection as well as bone issues .. did not come to know about how complicated the surgery was till the dr showed me the photos which his assistant had taken to show me .

Big thank to such Dr Chitrang and Team
reply_text:
Thank you Mr Mimit for your kind words...they mean a lot to us and helps us as a team to stay motivated to do better for our patients.
Thanking you once again and wishing you a speedy and uneventful recovery.
Regards
Team
The Dental Studio

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had to rush to the Doctor clinic as veneer broke off.  Dr. accommodated my last minute request and fixed the veneer.

It's highly expensive to only check the tooth and explained about upcoming treatment ₹1,000/-. Past experience only recommended the Doctor.

Please Note : 
If we come down to your clinic while coming pass 10 clinic to take perfection from experience experts. But after reach at the clinic and treated by other less experience docotr (I'm not doubt on her education and professionalism)but why won't we choose another doctor. 

We are happy to come down your place due to your work experience, knowledge and treated and explained very well. 

We understand in current situation you charge this amount but as customer it's really huge as first visit consultations. It's  better you take the same amount of money  and waived from the upcoming treatments.


Pleased don't mind Sir.

Be safe and healthy.

Thank You

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Absolutely fantastic experience from start to end. My mind was completely put to rest by the team, who explained my (several) dental problems in detail and all possible options were discussed before charting the treatment course. Fantastic team of surgeons who executed that plan efficiently (and rather painlessly) . All post-op instructions were made crystal clear and regular follow-ups ensured adherence. A special shout out to the Director, Dr Chitrang Thaker for facilitating everything and making sure I felt personally attended to at every visit. I would recommend the Dental Studio to anyone considering a one stop shop for all/any of their dental problems 200%.

I had a 9 am appointment and when I arrived at the clinic I was told that the doctor is not going to be available at all as he is at another clinic and if I’m willing to wait for and hour then can have me meet with another doctor 

I left the clinic because of this unprofessional behavior and I had a long commute to the clinic which was disappointing that even with 15 mins prime benefits associated with this doctor such an incident happened 

I have escalated this with Practo what can they do about this unprofessional behavior!
reply_text:
Hi ,

Sorry for the inconvenience. We always ensure to give the best services possible to our patients but sometimes things don't always go to plan. We had a dental emergency at another clinic early morning and so it was difficult to coordinate appointments. ON-LINE APPOINTMENTS do come with some drawbacks as there is no verbal communication n confirmation. Only message prompts which can go unnoticed at wee hours of the day.
As doctors we cannot always have a predictable schedule hope you can understand. KindLy feel free to call clinic helpline in case we have to schedule fresh appointment.
Regards

The doctor is extremely polite and narrated the whole situation and procedure very friendly. Treatment is done in very cordial environment. Apart than this it is a nice and hygienic place. A little more supervision from senior doctor would be more appreciable.

A brilliant service. Yes,The tooth was paining before I came to clinic and yes I was hell scared of the root canal. However, with after the root canal treatment, my teeth are absolutely fine. So much so that I hardly realised that the root canal was over.

review:
Visited Doctor for falling of one tooth. Doctor greeted us with a smile and inquired about my MIL who underwent some dental procedure few days back. He examined me and explained that part of tooth is still inside the gum and needs to be extracted. He explained the procedure, fixed a date as per our convenience and   prescribed the medicine. The Doctor also gave us solution with various alternative available for fixing of new tooth. The staff at the clinic were also very cooperative and helpful.

Altogether we had a good experience.
